1.content:
Where to begin? I am a private person and am recording this only for posterity and the belief that noone would ever believe the story anyway, because my alter ego Beverly isn't very theatrical either(she always wipes away peoples memory of her). Before I found the tiara, I actually always had fantasies of what it would be like to be female. Now I get to live out those fantasies anytime I want. I wonder if I am part of some experiment held against my will, it seems utterly bizarre what I am capable of and the source of where this comes from(Goddess) seems to be maddingly inconsistent. Am I just her plaything, a human pawn in the pasttime of the well meaning but narcissistic Goddess, or is this some sort of reward? I'm not a particulary good person, I am human.

It was last year, a week before Christmas. The University where I was studying had a lovely wooded area that I liked to walk around in. The usual you would find here; pines, willows and oaks among a few others. I often take long solitary walks wherever I happen to be, and this was my second time around this area. It wasn't far from the freeway, but this wood was well preserved, inhabited by a lot of animals and was gorgeous with the heavy snowfall. I was looking for something, but I didn't know what. I saw something glittering in the snow beside one oak. I lifted it up, and it was a tiara. Not the kind that the Pope wears, but a feminine tiara somewhat like Wonder Womans. I don't know why, people might have even seen me, but I put it on.
1.title: Miss Immortals origin

choices: Go to the bathroom and take off the tiara
Go back to the site where the transformation took place
Go to my next class as a girl
11.content:
The change was instantaneous. I transformed from an average 18 year old male into a living goddess, not only losing all traces of my male nature, but also my physical humanity. I might as well have been an alien from Krypton, and in a way I was. Except that I wasn't mortal, I was totally intangible and invulnerable to harm. I was an avatar of unlimited power. The tiara that sat atop my head was now surrounded by a curtain of wavy brunette hair that reached my waist. My head was smaller, my arms lost all muscle tone and were slender, my waist had contracted and hips grew out, I grew a bosem and I became tall and leggy.*

I slowly walked back to the main campus. After I was transformed, I felt a surge of energy, as if my body was reminding me of my new powers, though I wasn't quite aware of them yet. What I was aware of was my new enhanced intellect. Whether as Ben I was moderately gifted(At least that's what my folks and the IQ exam told me. 137 if you are interested), as a girl**, I was a total genius. I didn't realize that I was attracting stares until I felt the wind touching my ass. Oops. For some reason I was wearing a red roman tunic that made it all the way to the middle of it, and I giggled when I saw how large and perfectly proportioned it was. I wasn't wearing shoes or any kind of winter gear, and I'm sure my tiara attracted attention. Or maybe it was my face, or my boobs most likely. I felt no chill or need to cover up, as I felt totally normal and comfortable. I walked over to the nearest entrance, trying to find a bathroom where I could mug another girl for spare clothes that fit, but I didn't need to. When I reached the door, I inadvertently transmuted my snug red tunic into clothing more suitable for this time of year, and a pair of boots. A pair of golden boots actually that were thigh high. They felt magical.

I was getting progressively more stares from my fellow coeds, I had to regroup. So I went to...













*I did now have female sexual organs, but I didn't really need them. More of a flourish than anything.

**I has assumed I was stuck this way permanently, the optimist that I am, and renamed myself "Beverly McClane" as a cover.
11.title: Transformation into Miss Immortal

choices: Try and find out more about my powers
Go to class/Go back to dorm/Go home
111.content:
Hanging near the doorway, I remembered what I forgot. "Oh shit, my backpack". I left it back near the tree

"Oh, it's right there", pointed out a black haired man coming through the doorway.

"Thanks", I said sweetly.

Normally such a mundane complement would be tucked away into the memory bank or otherwise forgotten, but for some reason I had smiled and the man was attracted by it. He looked conflicted on whether to leave or not, but then he finally decided to head to his next class a split moment later.

I was also conflicted. Was I flirting, even unconsciously? I didn't feel any sexual attraction towards guys now*. Even weirder, where did my backpack come from? It just appeared. I stepped into a stall in the girls bathroom just to be sure. I entered a stall, set my backpack down, took off my jacket and layed it on the pack. I stepped outside the stall and looked at myself. I took off the tiara that I presumed was causing all of this, and indeed I transformed "back" into my old self. I ran back to the stall and locked the door. I put the tiara back on, half expecting to be back in my roman tunic, but I again transformed back into the girl with the t shirt and crinkle pants on I had before. I took it off again, same result. Put it back on again, same form as previously mentioned. Then I decided to morph my t shirt into a long sleeve shirt. It did so instantly. I turned it back, and then changed my hair color to golden red. I could see through the stall and see how beautiful I was.** I had to find out more about what I could do.








*Sorry, this is neither a slash fiction nor a sex romp.
**I later found out that I could control the entire electromagnetic spectrum and had powers similar to the Marvel character Erik Lensherr!
111.title: Go to the bathroom and take off the tiara

1111.content:
Before I left the bathroom, I checked to see if I could turn back into myself with the tiara. I morphed back into me while still wearing the tiara, but I soon discovered that shape shifting required willpower and was not instantaneous. Now I looked like a cross dresser, which I most assuredly was not. I morphed back into my old clothes and tried to see how long I could stay like this without reverting. I looked in the mirror, tried to make the tiara invisible(Successful transformation yet again), and willed myself to be in the mens bathroom. I then left that bathroom, which was a little ways from my previous occupancy, and I wandered down the learned hallways and out the exit.

Just to be sure, I walked back to where I was when I found that special tiara, not being lost at all with an already strong memory being enhanced by the magic, or whatever it was stemming from the invisible tiara.

"OK, so I don't really have to be a girl to wear this thing", lying to myself because I knew I really wanted to. It's a fetish I've had for a while now, starting with a dream I had at age 12 I think to drown out the noise of my parents fighting. I enjoyed my male self, but got progressively more active in this interest, after a while putting myself in place of the made up protagonist who had turned into a female, and I was dreaming lucidly as well.

"What shall be my next feat? Turn myself invisible?" I did so instantaneously, then reverted back.

"What about flying, and who am I talking to?"

I stretched out my arms and legs, and then launched into the air on my own free will.
1111.title: Try and find out more about my powers

11112.content:
Before you knew it,you were in the stratosphere. You managed to get the hang of your flight abilities. You couldn't wait to try out your other powers . While floating in the stratosphere you suddenly heard sounds of an immense battle taking place.

Darkseid had just arrived on earth and was battling the Justice League!
11112.title: You reach the stratosphere

12.content:
I would think of myself as a brave person, ready for anything. That is why I was not shocked when a woman appeared from the back of me. She looked to be in her late twenties and was wearing a white evening gown. I suspected something supernatutal about her, and was scared yes, but I kept my composure. Something was going on that let me know all of this, as I would usually look for a more sane answer(later I found out the tiara itself granted me intuition on a universal scale)

"That's my tiara you are wearing Ben. I know you like that sort of thing, and I know you do not the usual formalities in situations like this. You are too bright for that." She smiled sweetly.

"So I suppose you led me to this, or compelled me to put this on."

"I did."

Ben was somewhat concerned, but also interested in this. After all, wouldn't you be?

The woman spoke again. "That tiara was crafted by me a long time ago, and I endowed it with powers. I left it in my villa for a long time because I am...a drinker...

"I'm sorry, but are you a goddess?"

"Yes"

"So you have omniscience and omnipotence?"

"Why yes, yes I do."

"You must have an answer to how that could exist, but you have to play games with people. I'm sorry, I'm sorry for bothering you, but two more questions if I may."

"You may". The goddess arched one of her eyebrows.

"Firstly, there are no limits on how many questions I can ask, right?"

"Not at all Ben."

"Ok, are you the God of the desert?"

"In some manifestations, yes."

"In some?"

"I can't do certain things that He can, but I can say that He exists and that certain questions are unanswerable with logic alone. You've read Aquinas, haven't you?"

"What a cop out", thought Ben.

"I think you are just hiding your true identity, but I won't push it. OK, if you are omniscient and omnipotent, than what's the point of putting this tiara out here, or what's the point of anything really? Shouldn't you spend all of your time helping others with your powers? Or do you just ignore your abilities?"

"The latter, son. I'm a lot older than you think, so don't worry, we're not related. I do want to help people, but like I said, I'm a party girl and..."

"How would alcohol even affect you if you were a goddess? Or is it ambrosia, or nectar? We never figured out which one is the food and what is the drink."

"Right, and sometimes I don't know what it is either. Just in case you are wondering, the Greek Gods don't exist anymore, I never met them though that theory about the faith of the mortals determining the strength of the gods powers may have something. But how would you explain me? Noone has ever heard of me, I don't even have a real name. I eat and drink just like you do, and enjoy its effects because I choose to. I feel anything I want to, and I can handle that because I have a moral compass. The thing that seperates the gods(and God) from you mortals is that we are totally self sufficient yet still desire eachother for comfort. You mortals are interdependent and also need eachother for comfort, as well as for survival. I didn't create any of you, but I know everything about you. Well, not everything, I respect your privacy."

Ben thought all of this over quickly. "So what is this tiara for?"

"I'm a big fan of superheroes. Just you wait until Ironman and The Dark Knight come out, they are excellent. I want a superhero in real life, so I dropped it off here for you to find."

"Why me?"

"You've wished for this, Ben. Think of yourself like a combination of Captain Marvel, Batman, Galactus, Superman, Green Lantern, Luke Skywalker and others. Most especially though, Wonder Woman."

Ben transformed right away into an amazonian female. He grew several inches in height, his skin went down several notches on the von Luschan scale to a pale white, his hair grew even more curly than it was before while it grew to his back, and his body reconfigured itself into the prettiest, most curvacious female he ever met, himself. Then his clothes changed into a blouse, skirt and golden boots. It was 19 degrees out, but he felt perfectly fine in the cold.

"I am granting this tiara for you to have. Whenever you put it on, you will transform into this. You can call her whatever you want, but if I may, Miss Immortal has a good ring to it. Noone can ever remove it from your head but yourself, and when you do, you will return to your regular self, with no powers. As Miss Immortal, you can do absolutly anything you want. You are capable of anything. How do you feel?" She smiled really hard at me.

"I feel great!" And you did, but you were a little shocked by your sweet as honey voice. You felt like a million bucks, like you really could do anything.

"Am I really immortal?"

"Miss Immortal is, not Ben McGregor. Ben will stay alive as long as you choose him to. He will age just like a normal person, but you will stay young, or however old you wish to be, forever. Ben won't age when you are Miss Immortal."
12.title: The Goddess awakens

121.content:
Suddenly she left, needless to say I met her again but never found out exactly who she was(my Miss Immortal alter ego is a goddess just as she was, but as I am the younger, less experienced goddess, I need practice).

So there I was, a hot brunette with supposedly unlimited power. What is the first thing I should do? Well as much as I dug my Miss Immortal digs, I wanted to see if I had to be a girl or not. Now I can't explain why, I don't think gods and goddesses have sexual organs or even bodies, but I was totally aroused by my new form, and if I wasn't endowed with superstrength and enhanced will power, I would have keeled over to the sexual tension going on in my vag(sorry, I find the idea kind of disgusting as well). I decided to see if I could shapeshift, and I immeadiatly transformed right back to my old self. I still had all my superpowers, I felt it. Just for the hell of it, I levitated off the ground and shot an electrical blast out of my hand(which I dissipated right away). I glided around the forest and began to spin around a tree. I put my index finger on the tip of one tree, and I bored a hole into it with no effort at all! Forget Miss Immortal, I can be Mister Immortal! I actually felt kind of bad because I always respected Batman more that Superman for working at everything he could do. He was a mere mortal, who trained himself to become the smartest, most capable human in all of all time. Here I was, in the real world having everything handed to me. I don't even have an interesting origin story! I'm a college kid who was picked at random by a nameless goddess to become a ripoff of Wonder Woman. As intrigued as I was by the idea of being a chick, I liked being a guy more. But as I was gliding around the woods, I realized that I could switch on and off between these identities. I could roleplay at being whatever I wanted. I morphed into a whole bunch of different shapes. I turned myself into Indiana Jones, a pretty fat girl, random celebrities and people I knew.

Then I thought, "Why not?"

I transformed into my Miss Immortal form, and for some reason this felt more natural. You might think, "Isn't this just a plot device?" It may be, on a cosmic scale, but my Miss Immortal form felt most natural. It was like this was my natural form. Except for these clothes, no flair to them at all. I needed a coat, just so I could fit in, and it appeared right on me. I hoped that I could just will everyone into remembering my pretty eyes and adorable smile, and I found out that for the most part, I did. I led myself out of the woods and over a few snowy hills towards a parking area. "What should I call myself? Hmm?" A guy who I met a few times walked past me in the parking area and called me Beverly. Beverly, a nice name. Time for my 1:30 class.
121.title: Continue

choices: Try out more of my new powers
12111.content:
All the time spent with the goddess made me late! I hurried to the front door, then climbed several flights of stairs and through a long corridor to my class. Usually I am on time for this class, but I was distracted by something today, and for good reason! I noticed that I wasn't out of breath, nor did I feel even the tiniest bit of exhaustion. What I didn't realize until then was that I now had superspeed, and I was actually still two minutes early! Now I worried about whether anyone saw me run through the school like The Flash. And the tiara! I wished for it to be invisible and thank goodness, it did(though I could still feel it on my head, it vanished from my window reflection).

The class was typical. We were going over famous partial differential equations. I was a very good student in elementary school, but gradually my grades dropped off in later years due to laziness and allowing my mind to wander off into tangents. I eventually concentrated my curiosities into academic studies, otherwise what else would I be but an underqualified lecturer who doesn't get paid? This was one of several classes I took, all of which are in varied areas. I'll make my own way. I won't be apart of the growing establishment. I'll be an ubermensch.


I could do these problems anyway, but now that I was a goddess, I had superhuman intelligence and was the head of the class. I could now solve problems and process information at an unheard of rate. I could even read peoples minds! I read the instructors mind, which helped, but I felt bad because he was more concerned with going back home to his family. The second I heard my call my name("...Beverly McGregor"), I could also tell that he was attracted to me. I don't blame him, I was too! Not to brag, but gods and goddesses do tend to get away with that, and I was probably the hottest girl in the room. I sensed that I wasn't everyones taste, maybe my image was too squeeky clean? I later found out though that I could bend peoples minds and make anyone, male or female, attracted to me. The class ended on time, and a bunch of people left the room. Oh no! I'm a red blooded male, but Miss Immortal was attracted to every guy I saw! Every girl too! A bisexual goddess huh?
12111.title: Math 87

121111.content:
I was in a daze. It was 3:00, time to go home. I had a car, but why drive home when you can fly! I was walking past everyone in the hall while everyone looked at me, and you can believe how self conscious I was. I could sense their awe. I'm getting ahead of myself aren't I? I walked towards the wood again, wondering "Why was it me?"

I levitated off the ground again in my golden boots. I wished myself to be invisible, and so I was, yet I could sense every part of me. I was brimming with the kind of joy that even my artistic adept mind has trouble putting into words. The visual nuances were not poetic or reflective, but naturalistic, like in the best film are visual in nature, but I don't want to give away my secret identity with a visual reference(I morphed back into my old self and my old clothes and jacket reappeared). I accelerated through the trees, and then relied only on my superhuman senses and navigation to fly. I lounged in the sky and rested my head on a pillow until I reached the ( ) river. Imagine Peter Pan. That is a good way to describe it. Imagine the greatest high you've ever had.

Then I allowed my mind to wander enough to let my powers get the best of me. My music tastes are eclectic, but the best I could come up with in that giant hammock called the sky was Dusty Springfield. I was humming one of her songs to myself when suddenly that songs reverberated through the sky, making everyone on Earth hear it. Like I was the longest reaching radio wave in the world. I shut it off, and wondered what else I could do? I swam down to one of the cars on the freeway and read some dudes mind. Actually, he wasn't thinking about anything, but digging deeper allowed me to grasp this mans entire life, including his inner most thoughts. I felt horrible and swam away. Of course I was playing in traffic while I was invisible, so I was risking getting hit. No worries! The cars simply phased through me. I must be immortal. A thought just crossed my mind, what about reading the akashic records? I immeadiatly took on an astral form and appeared in someones study. A large, glowing orb of light that I knew was the akashic records was sitting right in front of me.

"Ben McGregor!"

Uh oh.



Who called my name?
121111.title: Try out more of my new powers

1211112.content: and he did know about my secret?
1211112.title: My grandfather

121112.content:
I walked through the exit confidently, with a certain flair in the way I walked. I headed to my dorm to find that it was locked. I simply willed it open, and it did. I willed for noone to have seen that, or for them to know anything about my special powers, and shut the door. Noone was here. I went to my side of the room and looked through my supplies. Everything was still in order, and I couldn't find one thing that would have been contrary to who I was before(Except for clothing, shoes and pictures). I left and decided to teleport myself to where I knew my friends were. On the way there(I let it take long so I could think), I realized how much I could really do.There was one superhero Goddess forget to mention, Dr Manhatten! His whole existence is shattered by the fact that he's omnipotent, what about me?"

I meet Cassandra and we decided to...
121112.title: Meet some friends

12113.content: You look at a clock nearby to realize that it was 1:28, "Crap! I'm going to be late." You ran to the classroom and realized that not only was it still 1:28, but that run also didn't even phase you in the slightest. You had superspeed and stamina beyond superhuman. You also realized that your identity changed when you changed to Miss Immortal as your teacher called you Beverly when he took attendance. Another realization was that you could easily understand everything that the teacher was talking about on a subject as complicated as Materialistic Philosophy. Because you so easily understood, you tested out other powers like mind reading, which you tested out on the teacher just to see exactly what he thought about a few students when he would call on them to answer a question. After class was over, it was 3:00 and you had no other classes. What to do now?
12113.title: Materialistic Philosophy

121131.content: You get to your car and a few thoughts run through your head. Why have a car when you can fly or run faster than the speed limit? Why not test out your strength with this car? What should you do?
121131.title: Test out more powers

1211311.content: "Screw it, I'll just go fast enough that people don't know who I am." You place your bag into the car, and then pick the car up. The car weighed about 2 tons, and yet you were able to lift it with a single finger. You then run back home taking a longer route that didn't involve going through the higher populated areas of town. Did you live in the city or out of town?
1211311.title: Take the car home

12113112.content:
Ben went way out of his way to not be noticed by people or cameras, and ended up at his small house outside of town (how very convenient). He got home and put the car down, but he decided to test his strength further. Because he lived alone and usually didn't really have any friends over or anything along those lines, he decided to use the car one last time. Ben picked up the car and started to crush it. He folded it over and over until it was smaller than his wingspan, then he condensed it as though he was crumpling a sheet of paper. The smaller it became, the more powerful he felt until it was as small as a can of soda. Ben also formed it to look like such. He looked at his accomplishment as it processes in his head that the small object in his hand was once his car.

Just then, a female figure appeared behind him, "Enjoying your power so far?" Ben jumped about 15 feet in the air and then landed on his back, "Who? What? Where? Oh, it's you." He said at the same woman who gave him his powers, "Judging by what you just did, I assume that you've tested a few of your new powers so far?" She said as she grabbed the car out of your hand and crushed it like a can, "Yes, yes I have." "I see, so you're getting used to being Miss Immortal rather quickly." "That seems to be the case." "Well then, I guess we can move onto the next phase of this transition from mortal to immortal then." "And what exactly does that mean?" "The time when you decide to either become a goddess living among mortals, free to do as they please. Or you can take on adventure alongside other gods and goddesses in our own realm. which will you choose, goddess?"
12113112.title: Out of town

choices: A refreshing sleep but, a suprise when I woke up?
13.content: I put on the tiara and as I waited...nothing happened. I was embarrassed and what if someone saw me? I put the tiara in my backpack and walked to the next class. In the middle of that class I suddenly felt dizzy. I walked back to the dorm and fell fast asleep.....
13.title: Nothing yet

choices: A friend rushes in to tell you about the new super heroin
You see the fire and the woman of your dreams on TV
The woman of your dreams speaks to you from the mirror
131.content:
While I slept I had the weirdest dream, or at least at the time I thought it was a dream. In my dream I woke up to find that I had transformed into a woman. I looked into my mirror and found the woman of my dreams. The kind of perfect woman I had always dreamed about. She was tall, blonde, very busty, and possessed an almost supernatural sex appeal. Before I could examine myself I heard the sound of a fire truck siren in the distance. Usually I would simply ignore this, but this time I felt compelled to investigate. This was why I assumed this was a dream because it seemed that I was not fully in control. It was like I was along for the ride. I could only seem to affect some minor control. A few head turns and an occasional hand gestures was all I could do. I raced out of my dorm room not through the door but the window three stories up. The amazing part was I did not hit the ground, I flew. I watched as the tops of the trees passed underneath me. My head then looked up and found the reason for the fire trucks. A fire had broken out in one of the college labs. Somehow I knew that a young man was trapped on the second floor and would soon be killed by the flames. I crashed through the roof of the lab as if it were paper and landed in the room with the young man. After quickly snatching him up I leapt back out of the hole in the ceiling from which I entered and came to a landing outside beside the fire trucks. Several fire men looked at me at shock and I looked at them with what felt like the pent up lust of a thousand years. Before I realized it I snatched one of them up and kissed him.

That’s when the dream ended. I then woke up still in my bed in my room totaling lacking any female anatomy.
131.title: Dream?

choices: Ben Checks His Backpack. He Still Has The Tiara
The Tiara Is Hidden Somewhere Else
There's A Knock On The Door
1311.content:
1:00 A.M. Crap, I missed all my afternoon classes.

I got up out of bed and noticed my roommate Brian reading a news article on his laptop.

"Hey Brian."

Hey turned around with this really weird look on his face, like he was trying not to laugh out loud or smirk really widely.

"I have a headache for the first time..well ever" says Ben.

"Sorry buddy. Ben, you missed something absolutely incredible. There was this hot girl here at the school...just look."

He hands me his computer, and I read the article. Apparently there was a chemical fire caused by misuse of ammonium nitrate in one of the research labs not too far from here earlier yesterday. Some idiot trying to make explosives. Firefighters rushed to the scene, which had spread within minutes, and as they were putting out the fire, a woman flying at around 60 MPH crashed into the top of the building.

Oh my god thought Ben. Was the dream real? Was this me?

Ben clicked on the video which accompanied the article.

The video of the superheroine showed her jumping out of the building with the student in her arms after she rescued him from the flames, and landing right in front of the firefighters. Putting him on top of a pile of blankets, she stared for a moment at all the firefighters with her hands on her hips before grabbing one of them and kissing them on the lips. Then she flew straight in the sky and was seen heading east. Rewinding the video and pausing on her standing before the firefighters, Ben appraised her looks. She was had long golden blonde hair was very tall, around 6'3. A brief glimpse of her face showed piercing eyes and a gorgeous, flawless face. Her breasts were huge without looking fake on her amazonian body, and her clothing consisted of brass chest armor protecting a simple pink mid sleeve shirt, a pair of long pink and white striped tights that showed off her curvy ass, a belt with a sheath carrying a blade of some kind, and tan thigh high boots. And a gold tiara.

Brian saw Ben's reaction and said "Pretty cool, huh?"
1311.title: A friend rushes in to tell you about the new su...

13111.content:
“Yeah, cool...” I replied uneasily as Brian went back to salivating over the preposterously beautiful Amazon on the screen. I used this as an opportunity to rifle through my bag-pack; yep, I was right, the same golden tiara that the superheroine had worn was the same one that I’d discovered that fateful winter morning. I remember myself thinking ’Was that dream real? It can’t be real! But what if it is? Was that woman, that hero, ME?! Did I just save those people?!’

My thoughts swirled round my head, countless questions and possibilities that I couldn’t possibly answer now. I slung my bag back round my shoulders as I pulled on a grimy old hoodie, my favourite lard of faded jeans and a pair of beaten up Converse Allstars. “Yo, where the hell are you going, bro?” Brian asked, his eyes still firmly glued onto the screen.

“For a walk, you pervy little bastard.” I pulled the chain across and pushed open the door handle only to find myself face to face with a stranger with her hand raised to knock on the door. The woman was unsettling with his pastel white face, pressed black suit and opaque spectacles that concealed his true expressions. I gulped and quickly tried to close the door but the woman stuck a polished shoe in the doorway before she let herself and her associate, who I hadn’t seen before, into the room.

“Can I help you guys out?” I whimpered as they scanned the entirety of my crap heap of a dormitory. The second man, a burly African American male, pulled out a brown wallet from his blazer pocket and displayed an official looking badge with ’DEPARTMENT OF UNUSUAL ARTEFACTS’ emblazoned on its golden surface. The woman spoke clearly and monotonously as she addressed me, saying, “I’m Agent Black, this is my colleague, Agent White, and we’re from the government-sanctioned Department of Unusual Artefacts. We have reason to believe that someone in this establishment has come into possession of a seriously powerful weapon. It looks like this:”

She pulled out a picture of the tiara and I clutched my bag strap even tighter. My mouth went dry as she asked me whether I’d seen it or not. Luckily for me, Brian never had the same problem and bluntly said, “Well you guys are wasting your time- me and Ben have never seen that thing before in our lives. I mean, how many 18-year-olds do you know play with tiaras? Come on.” I nodded eagerly, silently thanking Ben for covering for us both. I was beginning to feel slightly more comfortable until the ape-like brute that was Agent White stomped towards me.

My eyes unintentionally darted to my rucksack, an action that White instantly recognised as suspicious behaviour. He held out his grizzly paw as he grunted, “Pass the bag, squirt. NOW.” I remember quickly hiding my bag pack behind my back, slowly unzipping the top and feeling the cold metal of the tiara as I mouthed a silent ’Sorry’ to Brian. I saw White’s lips curl into an angry sneer while I heard the telltale noise of a gun being cocked behind my back.

“Pass the artefact over peacefully, son. You don’t want to make this worse than it already is...” Black said emotionlessly as she aimed her silenced pistol at the base of my neck. Brian was terrified, screaming, “Oh God, what the HELL is happening?! Ben, what have you done?!”

This was it: I was surrounded by two adults from some unknown agency who were obviously packing heat and not afraid to use it. I gulped deeply as I dropped the bag. “Kick it over.” I pushed the bag away from myself and into White’s expectant hands. He scanned through silently, his face moving from deadpan excitement to obvious confusion. A mischievous grin spread across my face as I pulled out the golden relic from my dusty hoodie pouch.

“Looking for this?” I laughed. White and Black both suddenly lunged at me desperately but alas, it was too late- I’d already placed that godforsaken tiara onto my head.
13111.title: Ben Checks His Backpack. He Still Has The Tiara

choices: The dream I had was  precognition,
I struggle between my own body and the body of the goddess
1313.content:
After the dream, I just couldn't sleep. I wondered what time it was, and checked the clock next to me. It said 11:34 PM.

"How did I sleep this late?"

I slowly got out of my sleeping position and remembered the tiara, laying in my backpack. I immediately became suspicious. I stared at my pack in the dark. I wondered where my two roommates were. Their names are Eddie and Kitty. At least one of them was almost always around when I came to the dorm. They could be out somewhere, maybe even together. Oh great, and I could potentially be cursed.

I was still fully clothed. I've probably only done that one other time. I've never slept this much either. I always made it a point to get the bare minimum of needed sleep and to get up as fast as possible if I wasn't enjoying any dream that day. This dream tonight was very intriguing, but it left me worried. Despite my analytical and skeptical nature, I kept an open mind and was worried that the tiara was somehow trying to coerce me into something. I've NEVER felt dizzy before, at least not intentionally so. It felt almost like a "Dr Strange" comic or an episode of "Buffy". Despite my apprehension, I walked slowly towards my pack, which was laying on the chair near my desk, and unzipped the bag for the tiara.

I pulled it out, and it was glistening in the darkness of the room. That didn't bother me as much as the fact that the light scattering on the walls, and the rooms layout was an exact replica of my dream. I was also shaking somewhat with the pleasure of being a female in the dream. Not that I didn't enjoy my maleness, but I always found something exhilerating about being the opposite sex. So much new sensory experience to enjoy. So much new perspective. And I supposed that in a small way, females could speak more freely about things. If I told some people about my enjoyment of "Project Runway", they would say I was gay! At least with a woman liking more traditionally manly things, there was usually a sort of admiration among their peers for bravery or competence. But this was a generalization...

I sighed. If I put the tiara on, I might become the woman of my dreams, but potentially be unable to come back. There also a number of potential worries that popped up in my mind if this happened. What if this tiara was magical, and was the product of some malicious entity? Usually in these scenarios, the potentially dangerous ones, I keep the cautious route. For some reason though, I swallowed my worries, said a prayer, and put the tiara back on my head.


Nothing happened.


I looked at my hands, my clothes, touched my hair, and everything was fine. I didn't feel any different. Could be a red herring.



I walked over to the full length mirror on the other side of the room, and stared at my reflection. It was now 11:38, as it said on Kitty's clock. I sighed.

Still wearing the tiara though, I started looking into the mirror.

Wait a second, it was all clear to me now.

There was a war among the unknown gods of their version of Paradise. You see, there are tons of gods, all living in their own dimension of reality. The Christian God was jealous of everyone else, and demanded that no human beings knew about the other ones. Which human beings were close to doing through mysticism all these years. It wasn't that these gods were evil, in fact some of them were benign and wanted to be left alone, but they also have human frailties and fallacys. They're ultimately just more evolved humans, though they were created as gods through belief by humans. Narrativium, just like in the Discworld. The ones that humans don't know about were born from the ones that were believed in, but didn't always follow the same mythic trajectory that we thought they did. Oh My Lord, this planet was the Roundworld! And I, this tiara belonged to a princess goddess. She was murdered, drained of power by a jealous god by rewriting history. Before she evaporated, she put as much of her power as she could into this tiara that I'm wearing right now. For me to find. She wants to come back...through me.

My mirror reflection flickered between my own wearing the tiara, and the goddess.
1313.title: The woman of your dreams speaks to you from the...

choices: Find an anonymous place to hide out.
13131.content:
This was when I heard the sirens.

I was shaking in anticipation. My self didn't hold back because I knew what was going to happen, as if I was totally in synch with this sentient magical object.

My body continued to flicker between my own and the one of the goddess, but I suddenly gave in and became her. Magic flowed over me, and standing in my spot was the blond bombshell from my dreams. I was wearing a silver evening gown and tan sandels, and nothing else. Unlike my dream, I could make decisions. I was assuming that since I was conscious, I had more control over the power of this tiara. I raised my left lower arm, and it went up with no trouble. I lifted my now dainty right foot, and it went up no differently than it's ever had before. The sirens were getting louder, I had to act.

I looked out the window. I thought, "Can I actually fly?" I tried to levitate in the room, and I suddenly lifted a few inches off the ground. My now longer hair drafted upwards for a second and then landed back in place. I took on the Superman position, and flew out the window, which for somehow opened on my command.

It was a cold night, and the fire in the lab I was heading towards lit the snowscape ablaze in gorgeous shadows and light. The breeze tickled my face and blew my hair and gown around, but I was in perfect control of what happened. I was going slower than my full potential I felt, but I reached the lab in less than 10 seconds by crashing headfirst through the roof. Ow? No, I didn't feel anything but grief at the situation and that I missed the window enterance. I missed because I still was nervous about my newfound powers and bond with a being that I had never known about beforehand. "What a spaz", I was thinking to myself.

You know how you or someone you know complained about superheroes causing more collateral damage than they were worth? I was thinking the same thing as I went through the roof and into the lab where I intuitively knew the fire had been started. Why did I have to miss the window? *Laughs* There he was, a physics student who I was only passably familar with. I've seen him because we take some of the same classes in the same rooms, but on different schedules.

"Russell!" I shouted, as the smoke enveloped the room

"Who are you?"

"Nevermind that", I said. "Why didn't you just leave?"

"I passed out from the smoke just before I grabbed a mask. Are you a superheroine or what?"

"Yeah", I said lamely. "You wouldn't believe me if I told you who I really am."

"Aren't you all" said Russell dryly.

I ran over to Russell in the smoke, which hadn't affected my breathing nor my eyesight in the least. I grabbed on to Russell, who was still wearing a mask over his nose and mouth, and carried both of us out through the roof, and onto the ground of the campus. "Whoops, forgot your jacket."

I flew back in, retrieved his coat, and flew back down on the ground when the firemen burst through the door to the labroom, and cops were on the ground.

"And who are you, lady?" asked one cliched cop with powedered doughnut partially on his lip.

"I...am Miss Immortal!", and gave him a long, ironic kiss. What a dumb name, in hindsight. The goddess wasn't immortal since she almost died, so neither was I probably. I rocketed into the sky, and took off.
